13.content:
Jeremy was stunned. He looked up, and up, and up.... to where the shower head was suspended at skyscraper heights far above him. In fact, the whole bathroom now seemed like a vast world in its own right. He couldn't believe it: shrinking was something that happened in cartoons, not in real life, and yet here he was, reduced to an absolutely tiny scale! The 18-year-old gulped as he tried to estimate his height; he was probably no more than an inch tall!

Of course, what made things even worse was that he suddenly realised he was also completely naked. He'd been trying to have a shower, so his clothes, bathrobe, towel - all the things that might cover him up - were now impossibly distant, not to mention huge enough to swallow him completely. Jeremy shivered, and instinctively tried to cover himself himself, suddenly cold and afraid.

He almost jumped out of his skin a second later when a noise like thunder suddenly reverberated through the room. He could even feel the vibrations from it. After a brief pause he heard it again, but it was only what happened next that make him realise what it was.

"HEY, ARE YOU DONE YET?! YOU'VE BEEN IN THERE AAAAGES!"

It was his kid brother, Seth, banging on the the door! Jeremy had no idea how long he'd been unconscious, but obviously some time had passed, and his little brother wasn't exactly known for his patience. Sure enough, a moment later there was another violent noise and the shrunken teen watched in horror as the door handle turned and the door started to open...

What came through the door defied belief.

Jeremy was used to looking down on his kid brother: an annoying brat much shorter than him. But now his "little" brother was nothing less than a colossus; a walking skyscraper whose footsteps were like earthquakes. For the first time in his life Jeremy was genuinely terrified. The realisation of how truly tiny he now was compared to his own younger brother was simply mind-blowing. The little teen was torn: on the one hand he desperately wanted to regain his size and he clearly needed help to do so. But on the other hand... the thought of Seth finding him and seeing him in this condition made his blood run cold.

"THAT'S SO WEIRD. I THOUGHT JEREMY WAS IN HERE. GUESS HE LEFT..." boomed the colossal boy.

Jeremy watched as the giant walked into the room, coming closer and closer and looming over everything. What should he do?
